title: Drink no Longer Water
creator_credit: Australian Wine and Brandy Corporation and Fontana Films
brief_description: A humourous romp through various wine styles set in the country in a castle-like structure. Vignettes played out by actors - some in period costume to emulate the character of various wine varieties/styles from Moselle “for first lovers” through to claret are you old enough? Featuring Australian actors Steve Bisley and Mel Gibson in their youth.
